channel.title: class on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in class on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: supervisions and teaching
item.description: supervisions I am currently co-supervising - together with Olga Kuryatnikova and Patrick J.F. Groenen - the research internship of Leon Czarnecki within his Business Data Science research MSc. The internship focuses on investigating the applicability of alternating direction method of multipliers (admm) for statistical and data science problems I am currently supervising the BSc Honours Research Class internship of Alexia Chirita. The project focuses on the potential application of a model-based approach to hierarchical clustering
